item.title: Billboard Music Trends Across the Decades
item.description: Krystal Virk For my final project in biostatistics, I collected data from people's spotify history to see if there was any relationship between how introverted or extroverted someone was in relation to how much time they spent listening to music. Music has always been such a constant force in my life, especially during this time of uncertainity due to the pandemic. I grew up listeining to groovy songs from Fleetwood Mac, Lionel Richie, and Celine Dion to name a few of my musical influences thanks to my parents!

item.title: Leukemia Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting
item.description: Krystal Virk Introduction library(readr) library(dplyr) Leukemia <- read_csv("Leukemia.csv") Leukemia<-Leukemia%>%select(-X1) head(Leukemia) ## # A tibble: 6 x 9 ## Age Smear Infil Index Blasts Temp Resp Time Status ## <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 20 78 39 7 0.6 990 1 18 0 ## 2 25 64 61 16 35 1030 1 31 1 ## 3 26 61 55 12 7.5 982 1 31 0 ## 4 26 64 64 16 21 1000 1 31 0 ## 5 27 95 95 6 7.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: Billboard Music Trends Across the Decades
item.description: Krystal Virk Introduction (4 points) For my final project in biostatistics, I collected data from people's spotify history to see if there was any relationship between how introverted or extroverted someone was in relation to how much time they spent listening to music. Music has always been such a constant force in my life, especially during this time of uncertainity due to the pandemic. I grew up listeining to groovy songs from Fleetwood Mac, Lionel Richie, and Celine Dion to name a few of my musical influences thanks to my parents!

item.title: Project 2: Modeling, Testing, and Predicting
item.description: Krystal Virk: Leukemia Project 2 Analysis Kv6653 - 0. (5 pts) Introduce your dataset and each of your variables (or just your main variables if you have lots) in a paragraph. What are they measuring? How many observations? library(readr) library(dplyr) Leukemia <- read_csv("Leukemia.csv") Leukemia<-Leukemia%>%select(-X1) head(Leukemia) ## # A tibble: 6 x 9 ## Age Smear Infil Index Blasts Temp Resp Time Status ## <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> ## 1 20 78 39 7 0.
